translations: 矾土，[矿物] 铁铝氧石；[矿物] 铝土矿

sentences.sentence: All of the bauxites are formed by weathering without any exception.
sentences.translation: 铝土矿全部是风化作用形成的，无一例外。

sentences.sentence: Properties of Products: We use Yangquan Super bauxites to produce high alumina bricks for hot blast stove. Main mineral compositions are mullite phases.
sentences.translation: 产品特点：热风炉用高铝砖采用阳泉优质矾土孰料为主要原料，经高压成型、高温烧结而成，主要矿物组成为莫来石。

sentences.sentence: The characteristics of the crystalline and glassy phases of various grades of sinteredChinese bauxites of the diaspore kaolinite (DK) type have been investigated.
sentences.translation: 本文研究我国水铝石-高岑石类型（DK型）高铝矾土烧结后结晶相和玻璃相的特征。
